A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: By far the weakest of any of the Star Wars movies since Attack of the Clones. Nonsensical plot lines are barely sinful when compared to the absolute trashing of Luke Skywalker. From start to finish\, this movie was cheesy\, lacked a profound or logical story line\, and would have been a completely lost cause if not for Daisy Ridley\, who continues to be a \"Rey\" of sunshine.
